Sounds amazing ... But most of us Kanto people

Learning how to use magic is easy. The key is to
have the talent for magic. Yellow, have you ever
been to the church to test your talent?
Me? I've never thought about it.
Miss Blue! I'm so glad you're okay! I was
Hehe, I told you they couldn't do anything to
me. The guys who came to me all became my
customers. Made some profit from them!
(Ha-ha.... That’s how she is, as always.)
New clothes? You look brilliant in it.
Miss Blue, I know this sounds all of a sudden,
but I have to go to the capital. We probably
can't see each other for a while.
No worries! I've seen this already! That's why I
came to the station to look for you.
Miss Blue, you don't seem to be surprised
Did you know where this sword came from? You
knew I could pull it out?
I was just looking forward to some drama. You've
always admired the Scarlet Hero, right? Even if
I hadn't tell you, you would have wanted to try
And you did succeed in pulling it out. That was
a big surprise! So much fun.
So it was just for fun? ... I'm surprised too!
Kanto Fair is great, for real. Although there is
less variety compared to the Alola marketplace,
since it is in the west after all, there are
Other people probably can't tell, but my
detector goggles have already told me!

Anyway, thank you so much for helping me get
If you really want to thank me, how about do me
Hehe... As what I can see, you are going to

it. Lucky you! I want to go on a trip too! This
annoying business takes up all my time, can’t
leave this behind even for a single day!
I hope you can take these two feathers with you.
Think it as you take my wish to travel with you!
Huh? That's it? That's what you ask for?
Yep. These are feathers of birds in Alola, with
beautiful colors. These are popular souvenirs

Maybe, this can get a great price.
